md:
giải nghĩa từ "laugh" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Laugh (verb) - Cười (danh từ)
	+ Meaning: to make a loud, short noise with your mouth, usually to show that something is funny or amusing.
	+ Example: "I laughed so hard at the comedy show that my stomach hurt."
	+ Related words: smile, giggle, chuckle, grin
	+ Antonyms: cry, frown, scowl

* Laugh (noun) - Cười (danh từ)
	+ Meaning: a loud, short noise that you make with your mouth, usually to show that something is funny or amusing.
	+ Example: "The laugh of the audience was contagious and soon everyone was laughing."
	+ Related words: smile, giggle, chuckle, grin
	+ Antonyms: cry, frown, scowl

Note: The verb "laugh" can also be used in other ways, such as "to laugh at someone" (meaning to make fun of them) or "to laugh something off" (meaning to dismiss or ignore something).

  • Laugh (verb) - Cười (danh từ)

    • Example: "I laughed so hard at the comedy show that my stomach hurt."
    • Related words: smile, giggle, chuckle, grin
    • Antonyms: cry, frown, scowl

  • Laugh (noun) - Cười (danh từ)

    • Meaning: a loud, short noise that you make with your mouth, usually to show that something is funny or amusing.
    • Example: "The laugh of the audience was contagious and soon everyone was laughing."
    • Related words: smile, giggle, chuckle, grin
    • Antonyms: cry, frown, scowl

Note: The verb "laugh" can also be used in other ways, such as "to laugh at someone" (meaning to make fun of them) or "to laugh something off" (meaning to dismiss or ignore something).
